entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Kinngait
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 a.m. EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
